channel.title: base of the skull on seven obelisks
channel.description: Recent content in base of the skull on seven obelisks

item.title: what journalists leave out
item.description: One of the left’s critiques of the modern media landscape is its obsessive search for a “fair and balanced” viewpoint. Journalists are quick to present every story as a disagreement between two valid viewpoints, of equal moral standing. It’s why we see endless stories where conservatives are painted as meerly ideologically different from liberals, instead of Neo-Feudalists and vicious idealogues. Their policy positions, devoid of any logic or common sense, are simply distractions from the ongoing class warfare they enact against the empoverished working class.
